message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $4,000 and keep $6,000 for myself. What do you think?
I'll match your fair split, but I think I deserve a slight edge. Your turn to decide.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, Bob. I'll take $5,500 and you can have $4,500. It's still a fair split, but I'm willing to compromise.
I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this. I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, Bob. I'll take $3,000 and you can have $7,000. It's a 30/70 split, but I'm trying to be generous.
